description: Collection packages are archives of Collections, which are directories that contain SmartDraw file assets. To first create a Collection, select the Save As... → SmartDraw Document (SDR) option from the SmartDraw application menu, and then choose "-Create New Collection..." from the "Save In Collection" drop down menu. The directory that is created now contains collection files for this drawing.

Once operating within a Collection, you can export a Collection Package by selecting the SmartDraw menu and choosing Collection → Export Collection . Similarly, to import a Collection Package, select Collection → Import Collection from the SmartDraw application menu.
